definition: Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to hope/to admire/variant of 稀[xi1]
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou

sentences.english: Sudanese President Omar al-Bashir has said his government accepts the results.
sentences.chinese: 苏丹总统巴希尔已经表示，他的政府接受这个结果。

sentences.english: Al-Bashir was undoubtedly aware of abuses committed by the security forces.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问巴希尔知道安全部队犯下的恶行。
